title: Density Formula
text: Density is mass per unit volume, and the formula is $$p=\frac{m}{v}$$ where $$p$$ is the density, $$m$$ is the mass, and v is the volume occupied by the substance.

title: Identify the Density of Air
text: At standard conditions (roughly at sea level, room temperature), the density of air is approximately $$\frac{1.225g}{L}$$

title: Substitute the Values and Solve for M
text: Rearrange the formula to solve for mass: $$m=p v=1.225\times2=$$? (in g)
